alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 3:54PM CDT until August 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central Kansas... Northwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beverly, or 6 miles east of Lincoln, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Beverly, Glendale and Westfall. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 229 and 249. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
